Installation¶

First download the FastSTI archived distribution and decompress it.

E.g.

wget https://www.simhub.online/media/dist/faststi/latest.tar.gz
tar xzvf latest.tar.gz

You also need to install some dependencies. These are the standard C development tools, the popular git source code control system, the GNU Scientific Library and Gnome’s Glib utility library.

On an Ubuntu GNU/Linux distribution you can do this:

sudo apt install git build-essential libgsl-dev libglib2.0-dev

On a Mac you can do this using Homebrew:

brew install gcc pkg-config glib gsl

We haven’t developed or tested FastSTI on Windows, but it should work, especially if you use the MinGW suite. Feedback (via the Github repository) on running it under Windows is welcome.

Now you’re ready to test FastSTI.
